channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-22908] FileExecutionGraphInfoStoreTest.testPutSuspendedJobOnClusterShutdown should wait until job is running

comments.comment: fpaul could you take a look at this problem?
